titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a deduction for the cost of groceries purchased by employees and prepared into meals by employers for the convenience of employers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/25/1998--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow for the exclusion of the cost of groceries purchased by employees which are prepared into meals by employers.
